review: I have an older LCD. Vizio 47" HDTV, but it was before the advent of smart TVs and WiFi connectivity. I didn't want to buy a new TV just to YouTube and what not. The only reason I left a star out is the limited number of apps that allow for Chromcasting. Thankfully Pandora and YouTube are on the list. I am sure It will grow.

review: I give it a 2 because my friend has one and her's ALWAYS works. My Chromecast ALWAYS freezes, when i'm streaming from my macbook or my phone. I cannot watch one show even five minutes and it reboots itself or freezes. I reset it, I restart it, I close out of the App. I restart my computer and reset everything from the beginning. Yet again nothing...I am beyond frustrated. It is lovely when it works and I hope it works for you but I give up after 3 weeks of constant interrupted play...
